dmca.title: Spine-health.com gets backache over copied website
dmca.body:
We have identified a website indexed in Google who has violated our copyrights under the DMCA. The infringing website is located at http://www.spinename.com It is a verbatim copy of our copyrighted website www.spine-health.com. The infringed material has been posted to the website with only the name of the site altered from Spine-health to Spinename. The company logo has also been copied.

The Search Query: Spinename produces a results page displaying a link to the http://www.spinename.com website as the eighth record of results.

Our contact information is:

Spine-health.com
[private] Chicago, IL 60602
(312) [private]
[private]@spine-health.com

The Whois record for the owner of the infringing Spinename website is:

[private]
[private] Syracuse, NY 13210 (315) 425-2332
[private]@spinename.com

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

We request that Google removes the website from its index and notify any third parties promptly. We would appreciate a response. Thank you and please do not hesitate to contact me if you have any questions or require additional information. Thank you for your assistance.
 
 
[private]
President, Spine-health.com
